QuestData.Title: Skulk Rock Clean-Up
QuestData.Description: Years ago, there used to be a Horde base deep within Skulk Rock. It's been abandoned since then, but it's still prime territory, worth reclaiming.$B$BThe problem is, it's full of oozes by now. They're nasty things... mindless, corrosive, eat anything they find.$B$BI need someone brave to go to Skulk Rock and get rid of those slimes. Are you brave enough, $n?
QuestData.CompletionText: Don't get caught offguard. Even if one slime doesn't seem like much, once one gets you pinned down... the others won't be far behind.
QuestData.RewardText: It's good to see you back... and not missing any limbs, either.
